TA0001.name: Initial Access
TA0001.description: Techniques used to gain an initial foothold within a network

techniques.name: Exploit Public-Facing Application

techniques.name: Phishing

techniques.description: Adversaries may manipulate products or delivery mechanisms to distribute malware

techniques.name: Valid Accounts

TA0002.name: Execution

techniques.name: Exploitation for Client Execution

techniques.name: Valid Accounts
